title: Wanted Detroit N172 Old Judge cards
author: jcmtiger

posts.post_title: Wanted Detroit N172 Old Judge cards
posts.post_content:
added this rare advertising calendar top for trade. Purchased 3 of these along with Wolverine News Detroit players in 1997.   Have not seen a sale for these since. These are shown in a book called "baseball Treasures . Value in 1996 at $500.00 and up   .    



Wants:

Lady Baldwin any card
Pete Conway any card
Deacon White any card
Pretzel Getzein any card
Mike Goodfellow any card
John McGlone pose 311-1
George Rooks  pose 391-1
Bobby Wheelock pose 493-1
Barney Gilligan  pose 189-1, 189-2
Kid Baldwin error pose 16-6

Have for trade all Detroit
N172 Thompson pose 456-1 raw, not graded
1888 N29 Allen & Ginter Getzin psa 4 vg-ex
1887 N28 Allen & Ginter Bennett psa 2 good
1888 N43 Allen & Ginter Getzin SGC 30 good
1888 Scrapps Brouthers SGC 30 good
1888 Scrapps Hanlon SGC 20 fair
1888 Scrapps Thompson SGC30 good

Have some cash too  

Thanks for looking Joe
